report.title: Retarded
report.author: Derker
report.bodytext: The night started off with me taking 2 Halcion and 2 small Xanax pills. I invited my girlfriend over to keep me company. Right before she showed up I took 1 more halcion (.25mg each) and had one small Bailey's and cream. /n /n After that drink I have barely any recollection of the night. Apparently I was completely belligerent, fell over on multiple occasions, sang songs about being a woman, and then passed out. While I was out my girlfriend said I was convulsing for a short period of time, and then became somewhat catatonic- I was laying down but holding my hand up, and she could mold my fingers into any shape she liked, they would stay that way. /n /n I am lucky she stayed with me that night and kept me in check, I have no idea what else I could have done while under that heavy of an influence. /n /n That said, benzos and alcohol in general will lead to problems, and blackouts. So doing them together is not a good idea in the first place. /n /n I use Halcion on a regular basis to help with sleep. If I take double or triple the dosage then I get into a very hypnotic-esque mood before falling asleep, if not passing out completely. I make hiphop beats-and have woken up the morning after a halcion use with the loop still playing 8-9 hours later. Goofy, but true. /n /n They say Halcion isnt that great for you, especially compared to other benzos. I enjoy using Xanax and Valium recreationally, but I find them necessary as well for my social anxiety.
